summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account balance and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account from September 1 to September 30, 2017. It includes information about deposits, checks paid, and outgoing transfers, highlighting significant financial activity during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial statement from Deutsche Bank, detailing his account balance and transactions.

persons.name: William G. Hammond
persons.context: William G. Hammond is mentioned as the recipient of an outgoing money transfer from Epstein's account.

persons.name: Stewart Oldliekl
persons.context: Stewart Oldliekl is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

connections.description: Epstein made an outgoing money transfer to William G. Hammond's account.

events.title: Check Payment
events.description: A check (number 1336) was paid from Epstein's account for an amount of $1,560.11.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $25,467.19 was made from Epstein's account to William G. Hammond's account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, 00802, United States Virgin Islands
Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, 345 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The account balance for Jeffrey Epstein as of September 1, 2017, was $641,132.74.
A check payment of $1,560.11 was made from Epstein's account on September 5, 2017.
An outgoing money transfer of $25,467.19 was made to William G. Hammond on September 27, 2017.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees reported for the statement period.
Stewart Oldliekl is listed as a contact for inquiries regarding the account.
